entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Restore client-side state after failing to reconnect to the circuit #56678
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [CG] Update spa-templates npm dependencies #56674
  • No error when calling a post api in .net 7.20 #56672
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56671
  • Give us an option to enable loose binding for invalid data and providing default values for invalid properties in JSON in HTTP Post #56663
  • Can't use custom parsers with [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #56662
    Backlog

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24353.17] The "ResolvedCompressedAssessts" task failed unexpectedly. #56664
  • Better reconnection logic for Blazor Server #32113
    9.0-preview5
  • SignalR: Using IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in native AOT #56179
    9.0-preview7
  • Add overloads for validation problem results that accept IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]> #41899
    Backlog
  • [API Proposal]: Add new constructor for `HttpValidationProblemDetails` that accepts a `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, string[]>>` #56370
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, mvc #56620
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #56649

PullRequests

Created

  • [CG[ Update ws dep in release/8.0 #56677
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • [CG] Update ws dep in release/6.0 #56676
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm package cache 2024-07-08 #56673
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc
  • Add requirements comment to update-npm-dependencies #56670
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24358.2 #56667
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1d17ea1` to `34ad51b` #56646
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • [release/8.0] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #56488
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.8
  • [release/6.0] Bundle runtime .MSI's instead of .exe's #56632
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.33
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.8
  • [release/6.0] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #56487
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.33
  • Support IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in SignalR native AOT #56583
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview7
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Fix typos #56530
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking
  • Amortise HTTP Result Content-Type arrays #56525
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Use char overloads to Join/Index strings #56531
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Use pattern matching #56532
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Avoid StringSegment conversions #56533
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Removing unsafe parts of Decode method in QueryStringEnumerable #56630
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable internal runtimes and disable old creds #56428
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use UtcNowParameterKey constant to replace usages of "UtcNow" in DatabaseOperations.cs #56442
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56547
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine Locking_ExecuteAllRequestsWhenDisabled #55653
    area-middleware
  • mark verified files as lf and utf8 #56643
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • Fix ProjectTemplate build steps with new JDK #56199
    area-signalr
  • Updated naming pattern used the s_ prefix for private static fields #56647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Date only and time only is not supported in blazor change detection for parameters #55914
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message & Helper Class #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
